evidence.claim: Voyager Home Health Care utilizes AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure and services.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their data handling and health information exchange.
Voyager implements HL7 and FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Their platform supports EDI transactions, particularly X12 formats for billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages with X12 standards, key for claims and eligibility operations.
